txt.en: E贸mer's voice rings through the caves, 'Fall back to the centre. The women and children must be protected!'
The stables behind the gate-house are under attack! Protect the horses before they are driven away!
Dunlendings are trying to set flame to our towers! Defend the watch-towers north of the main gate!
The enemy is massing and preparing his assault. Ready your defences!
'Enemy archers approach! The time is very short! Fall back!'
'We must protect the women and children. Gamling has gone west, Gimli east.'
'Aid them as best you can. We must not lose this battle.'
Glittering Caves - Solo
Gamling's voice echoes through the caves, 'Help on the western island!'
The enemy is attempting to weaken the gate from behind! Prevent them from using their black powder!
'The women and children are safe and our supplies are secured.'
'Wait for the Horn of Helm Hammerhand to ring out. Then we go to the King!'
E贸mer's voice calls out, 'They are thinning. We will soon have a break. Make the best of it!'
Gimli's voice echoes through the caves, 'I need aid in the eastern tunnels!'
E贸mer's voice echoes through the caves, 'We have driven them back!'
Dunlendings are trying to set flame to our tower! Defend the watch-tower nearest the main gate!
An enemy war machine approaches the main gate! Protect archers as they fire upon it!
You must have completed the 'Deeping-coomb' battle.
The statue of Helm Hammerhand is under siege! Do not let them desecrate Helm's monument!
E贸mer's voice calls out, 'Defend the women and children, they come for the centre!'
Dunlendings are attempting to dam the river with large stones! Supply the Rohirrim Archers as they fire upon them!
